text: kya ve vichaar nahin karate ki jis allaah ne aakaashon tatha dharatee kee utpatti kee hai, vah samarth hai is baat par ki unake jaisee utpatti kar de[1]? tatha usane unake lie ek nirdhaarit avadhi banaayee hai, jisamen koee sandeh nahin. phir bhee atyaachaariyon ne kufr ke siva asveekaar hee kiya
